abstract: Abertis Infraestructuras and Citigroup withdrew their $12.8 billion bid to lease the Pennsylvania Turnpike on Tuesday, after Pennsylvania lawmakers made it clear the proposal was unlikely to come to a vote in the current session.
lead_paragraph: Abertis Infraestructuras and Citigroup withdrew their $12.8 billion bid to lease the Pennsylvania Turnpike on Tuesday, after Pennsylvania lawmakers made it clear the proposal was unlikely to come to a vote in the current session.

headline.main: Consortium Pulls Bid to Lease Penn. Turnpike
